footer_we_are_on_a_mission: We are on a mission to open up language to everyone, crafted by expert humans, powered by technology, and efficiently delivered.
the_easy_way_to_get_your_documents_trans: The easy way to get your documents translated fast.
welcome_hero_title: We open up language to everyone
welcome_hero_description: Professional translation services made easy. Crafted by expert humans, powered by technology, efficiently delivered.
professional_translation_description_par: The easy and fast way to professionally translate documents, manuals, websites and more, according to your schedule and requirements.
We currently Support Arabic, English, Korean, and Russian.
official_translation_description: Our professional translation services can be certified or sworn in Court, depending on the country where you must present your document.
urgent_translation_description: We can translate large volumes in less than 24 hours thanks to our large network of translators powered by optimized technologies.
our_team_is_ready: Our team is ready to find a solution
please_send_us_an_email: Please send us an email or leave a voice message.
we_will_help_you_get_a_quote: We will help you get a quote for complex documents, PDFs, websites, software, and more.
lots_of_vetted_professional_translators: Lots of vetted professional translators and clients have been translating the intelligent way through our platform.
subject: Subject
we_trust_you: We trust you: feel free to pay within 5 days from delivery via bank transfer, credit card, or PayPal.
